text.0: Ogun State Police Public Relations Officer said police is the least corrupt government agency in Nigeria however reports of studies from by independent organisations show that police is  the most corrupt agency in the country. Read here: https://t.co/rnhVbMZGW3 #DubawaChecks
text.1: On Nigerian Governors' proposed plan to borrow about N17trn from the pension funds, it is important to remember that the government has no authority over the money. What laws guide this fund and why can't governors borrow from it? Read here: https://t.co/M7sSfmJnhg #DubawaChecks
text.2: Lai Mohammed's recent claim that Nigeria has remained at the mercy of terrorists because global partners denied attempts by the country to acquire platforms and weapons to fight terrorists is misleading. Read here: https://t.co/v5mqZBOtmp #DubawaChecks
